page.title: 07Education-Broughton/Holt
page.content: Primary education is covered by two schools. St Marys Broughton Gifford still has connections with the church and although numbers have decreased it still caters for about 70 children in 3 classes. There are 3 full time teachers, one being the headmaster, and one part-time teacher. Holt Church of England school has 99 pupils in 4 classes with 4 full time teachers and one part-time. Three secondary schools serve this area, pupils from St Marys go to George Ward School at Melksham. Pupils from Holt can elect to attend either Clarendon School at Trowbridge or St Lawrence at Bradford-on-Avon, each being five miles away. Pre-school education is covered by the playgroups. Adult education locally is restricted to soft furnishing and keep fit.
